title: AI Integration In ERP Evaluation Across Trends and Architectures
summary: The incorporation of Artificial Intelligence (AI) into Enterprise Resource Planning (ERP) is a dramatic transition from static, on-premises systems to systems that can adapt and operate in cloud-native architectures. Cloud ERP solutions like Workday illustrate this evolution by incorporating machine learning, deep learning, and natural language processing into a centralized data-driven ecosystem.
